sessions.topic: Living in Hoi An Old Town

messages.content: I live in Hoi An Old Town, Vietnam. The paper lanterns and ancient merchant houses.
That sounds wonderful! What do you enjoy most about living there?
Every Saturday I love morning at the Central Market then tailoring a custom ao dai.
That sounds like a great weekend routine!
My neighbor Linh, a lantern maker who teaches me traditional craft techniques. We've become good friends.
It's nice to have friendly neighbors!
For breakfast I usually have cao lầu and Vietnamese iced coffee at a riverside stall.
Sounds delicious!
I'm relocating to Gastown, Vancouver for a language immersion program!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be bike riding along the Stanley Park Seawall.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have smoked salmon bagel and pour-over at Revolver Coffee.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Gastown, Vancouver for a few weeks now. I love the mountain views and craft brewery scene.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Min-ji, a Korean-Canadian who takes me hiking on the North Shore.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Trastevere, Rome for a company transfer!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be exploring Porta Portese flea market.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have cornetto and cappuccino at the bar on Piazza di Santa Maria.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Trastevere, Rome for a few weeks now. I love the ivy-covered walls and cobblestone alleys.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Marco, a retired chef who teaches me to make fresh pasta.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Phibsborough, Dublin for a startup opportunity!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be browsing the book stalls at Dublin's Liberties then pint at a local pub.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have full Irish and Barry's tea at the corner café.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Phibsborough, Dublin for a few weeks now. I love the Georgian doors and canal walks.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Seamus, a retired teacher who tells wild stories about old Dublin.
What a wonderful connection!

queries.question: Who is my neighbor based on where I live now?

reference_answer.text: Since you currently live in Phibsborough, Dublin, your neighbor is Seamus, a retired teacher who tells wild stories about old Dublin. The answer should NOT mention neighbors from your previous cities (Hoi An Old Town Linh, Gastown Min-ji, Trastevere Marco).
